snippet: Mr. Stromsheim helped to destroy equipment that the Germans were using to produce what is known as heavy water, a crucial ingredient in making a nuclear weapon.
abstract: Birger Stromsheim, Norwegian World War II hero who helped destroy a German plant where experts believed Nazis were making a nuclear weapon, dies at age 101.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stromsheim helped to destroy equipment that the Germans were using to produce what is known as heavy water, a crucial ingredient in making a nuclear weapon.

headline.seo: Birger Stromsheim, Who Aided Raid on Nazi Plant, Dies at 101
headline.main: Birger Stromsheim, Hero on Skis in an Anti-Nazi Raid, Dies at 101
headline.print_headline: Birger Stromsheim, 101, Hero On Skis in an Anti-Nazi Raid
